Post-Simulation Trajectory Analysis

Quick search

hbonds.py¶

Run Cylindricity script

usage: hbonds.py [-h] [-t TRAJ] [-g GRO] [-p TOP] [-b BEGIN] [-e END] [-x]
                 [-r RESIDUES [RESIDUES ...]] [-a ATOMS [ATOMS ...]]
                 [-d DISTANCE] [-angle ANGLE_CUT]

Named Arguments¶

-t, –traj

Path to input file

Default: “wiggle.trr”

-g, –gro

Coordinate file

Default: “wiggle.gro”

-p, –top

Gromacs topology file

Default: “topol.top”

-b, –begin

End frame

Default: 0

-e, –end

Start frame

Default: -1

-x, –exclude_water
 

Exclude water while searching for hbonds

Default: False

-r, –residues

Residues to include in h-bond search. Water is automatically included if you do not specify the -x option

Default: [‘HII’]

-a, –atoms Atoms for to include for each residue. Each list of atoms must be passed with a separate -a flag for each residue inargs.residues
-d, –distance

Maximum distance between acceptor and donor atoms

Default: 0.3

-angle, –angle_cut
 

Maximum DHA angle to be considered an H-bond

Default: 20

Classes¶

class hbonds.System(traj, gro, top, begin=0, end=-1, res='all', exclude_water=False)¶
class hbonds.Residue(name)¶
class hbonds.Topology(top)¶
